  I was sending a similar answer...

  Apparently when the Mongo=
ls landed on some beach in Kyushu, some 
  samurai went forward and said so=
mething like...:
  "I am Goro Takanomuro , aged forty-five, a resident of t=
he 
  provin..........."
  And that was it.
  I assume that the Japanese wa=
rriors, being practical people, probably 
  discarded such intro, at last w=
hen fighting against the Mongols.

he 13th

was challenged by Shinagawa Daisen during a seige of Gassan-toda
  > castle=
, and were allowed to fight it out in front of the two armies.

k the challenge to Shikanosuke was specific. But similar
